snippet: It seemed, one article said, as if Mr. Tozzoli had personally willed the trade center into existence, outfoxing enemies, bullying colleagues and maneuvering around problems.
abstract: Guy Tozzoli, among the most important figures in the development of the original WOrld Trade Center in Lower Manhattan, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: It seemed, one article said, as if Mr. Tozzoli had personally willed the trade center into existence, outfoxing enemies, bullying colleagues and maneuvering around problems.

headline.seo: Guy F. Tozzoli, Who Led Team That Built Twin Towers, Dies at 90
headline.main: Guy F. Tozzoli, 90, Who Led Team That Built Twin Towers, Is Dead
headline.print_headline: Guy Tozzoli, 90, Who Led Team That Built Twin Towers, Is Dead

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
